k_mccarthy wrote:
> Or I can synchronize A and B to the same time. And by this I want to
> mean that if I reset B, A will be reset too. This sounds like shared
> state.

Yeah, but there's no feature in REST that will let you know A and B will 
synchronise. That could be communicated over REST to something or 
someone that understood the communication, but it isn't in REST.
